com.aj.android.commons.app

Class DisplayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.app.DisplayUtils

  • public class DisplayUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of all method for getting screen display size width and height and other related utilities.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

      • getActionBarHeightInDp

        public static int getActionBarHeightInDp(Context context)
        Gets the action bar height in dp.
        For devices before VERSION_CODES#HONEYCOMB / API Level 11, It is always fixed value.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        int - density pixels height for action bar.
